message: I propose dividing the money with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This allows us both to have a significant portion while ensuring I get a larger share.
I'll give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more for taking on the risk of negotiating with you.
Considering the inflation, I propose a new 72/28 split. I aim to maintain a fair balance while adjusting to the reduced value of the currency.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 45% is a fair share for me, considering the risks and uncertainties in this negotiation.
